text: @realDonaldTrump If every citizen in the U.S. gargled twice a day with the brown Listerine that contains about 20 percent alcohol, would the #COVID19 infection rate drop? Seriously. Sometimes the med establishment does overlook the obvious and the inexpensive solutions.
